Sentencas: Potentialities of the method of electrophoretic deposition of thin-film coatings based on micrometer powders of multidoped barium cerate BaCe0.8Sm0.19Cu0.01O3-delta (BCSCuO) and BaCe0.89Gd0.1Cu0.01O3-delta (BCGCuO) were considered.
Titulo: Aggregatively Stable Suspensions of Micrometer Powders of Doped Barium Cerate for Electrophoretic Deposition of Thin-Film Coatings of Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Micrometer powders of BCSCuO and BCGCuO were produced by the methods of solid-phase and citrate-nitrate syntheses, respectively.
Titulo: Aggregatively Stable Suspensions of Micrometer Powders of Doped Barium Cerate for Electrophoretic Deposition of Thin-Film Coatings of Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The dispersity, fraction composition, and electrokinetic potential of nonaqueous suspensions of these powders and the electrokinetic parameters of the electrophoretic deposition process were examined.
Titulo: Aggregatively Stable Suspensions of Micrometer Powders of Doped Barium Cerate for Electrophoretic Deposition of Thin-Film Coatings of Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: An ultrasonic treatment and ultracentrifugation produced aggregatively stable suspensions of BCGCuO and BCSCuO micrometer particles in a mixed (70/30 vol %) isopropanol-acetyl acetone medium.
Titulo: Aggregatively Stable Suspensions of Micrometer Powders of Doped Barium Cerate for Electrophoretic Deposition of Thin-Film Coatings of Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: These suspensions are characterized by high positive values of the zeta potential (+24 and +28 mV, respectively).
Titulo: Aggregatively Stable Suspensions of Micrometer Powders of Doped Barium Cerate for Electrophoretic Deposition of Thin-Film Coatings of Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Thin film coatings of the electrolyte materials BCSCuO and BCGCuO, which are of interest for the technology of medium-temperature solid-oxide fuel cells, were produced by the electrophoretic deposition onto a dense model cathode.
Titulo: Aggregatively Stable Suspensions of Micrometer Powders of Doped Barium Cerate for Electrophoretic Deposition of Thin-Film Coatings of Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells
